Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe says that his aim is to develop the country rapidly. He said that the 160 to 200 billion rupees would be allocated for next two year to achieve this target. The Prime Minister said this during a function to handover land deeds to estate workers at Panwila area in Kandy.Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe said that people will be provided with many benefits in the future similar to building the economy methodically since 2015. Ministers Lakshman Kiriella, P. Digambaram and MP Wadiwel Suresh also expressed their views on the occasion. People in the estate sector thanked the government for giving them land deeds which they have hoped for a long period of time.
